text:
Yes, it seems the HubSpot Code Editor does not like the minified version of UIkit.

The best option would be include this file from a CDN. If you really want to host it locally in HubSpot, use the unminified version.
or you can wrap the code in {{raw}}{{endraw}}
<@U38EZFVFE> you mean {{% raw %}} {{ all uikit minified code }} {{% endraw %}} ? ...It creates other elsewhere...
if there are brackets in the code it could cause HubSpot to want to compile it. `raw` prevents that
